about.title: About Me
about.name: Name : Ryan PINA-SILASSE
about.description: Since a young age, I have been immersed in technology, a passion that naturally led me to a career in this domain. Now a professional web developer, my journey and curiosity have allowed me to cultivate technical skills while nurturing my creativity. I am always eager to learn and discover new ways of doing or thinking, whether by using tools like React and Next.js or broadening my horizons with Golang to move towards a more Fullstack role. Innovation is the heart of my daily life. I am currently looking for a position where I can use my skills to contribute to ambitious projects while continuing to learn and innovate. Available immediately, I am ready to turn your ideas into concrete and impactful solutions !

0.name: Bumble B
0.description: Developed as part of my final year project, Bumble B is a mobile application that controls a small car equipped with an ESP32 module provided by the school.

1.name: Konbini website
1.description: I was responsible for redesigning the homepage of the website. I also contributed to the integration of new features and UX optimization.

2.name: HairSwift
2.description: A project created to explore Go’s capabilities. It efficiently manages a hair salon with features like appointment scheduling, employee management, and service tracking.

3.name: Bitjutsu
3.description: This project was designed to practice token integration. It is an application that allows users to edit an image via text prompts, utilizing the Replicate API.

4.name: EcoMap
4.description: This app prototype was created for my final year defense. The application uses a map to display a list of ecology-related events.

5.name: Calculator
5.description: As the name suggests, this is a calculator built with React by following a tutorial. The main goal of this project was to familiarize myself with the framework.
